mapper.select: select role_assignment.role_id as role_id, role_assignment.user_id as user_id, user_info.user_account as user_account, user_role.role_name as role_name from role_assignment LEFT JOIN user_info ON user_info.id = role_assignment.user_id LEFT JOIN user_role ON user_role.role_id = role_assignment.role_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
